short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to open Gmail at NewTab. It will basically Override the new tab page with Gmail.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to open Gmail at NewTab. It will basically Override the new tab page with Gmail.com. You can easily access your Gmail with just 1 click.
